review: I am running an approved router, Windows 8, did everything tech said to set this thing up and it still does not connect to my network. Every device I own connects easily. Even tried another approved router to no avail. I could spend hours every night trying to get tech help on the line so I'm past my window of opportunity to return it. I would NOT recommend this gadget there are better ways to connect your devices to your tv.

review: Chromecast is great for streaming videos from an app, BUT I bought the Chromecast to stream videos from my Chrome browser on my laptop. This only works if you are watching videos from YouTube. If you stream videos from your laptop on any other website, there's an UNBEARABLE LAGGGGG. This is annoying because the product description clearly states that it supports laptop streaming... Google's definition of streaming is apparently: stop motion picture x 1,000 = UNBEARABLEI'll be sending it back for a refund.
